blocks.name: ccphlo
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all complex inner product spaces (also called pre-Hilbert spaces).

blocks.name: df-ph
blocks.content: Define the class of all complex inner product spaces. An inner product space is a normed vector space whose norm satisfies the parallelogram law (a property that induces an inner product). Based on Exercise 4(b) of [ReedSimon] p. 63. The vector operation is ` g ` , the scalar product is ` s ` , and the norm is ` n ` . An inner product space is also called a pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ph(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(ccphlo, cin(cnv, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), co(cneg(nat1), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cexp, nat2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: phnv
blocks.content: Every complex inner product space is a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm phnv(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
} = {
  sseli(c0, ccphlo, cnv)
  eqsstri(ccphlo, cnv, cin(cnv, coprab(hs2, hs4, hs3, wral(hs0, crn(cv(hs2)), wral(hs1, crn(cv(hs2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), co(cneg(nat1), cv(hs4), cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))))
  df-ph(hs2, hs4, hs3, hs0, hs1)
  inss1(cnv, coprab(hs2, hs4, hs3, wral(hs0, crn(cv(hs2)), wral(hs1, crn(cv(hs2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), co(cneg(nat1), cv(hs4), cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))))))))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs4.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm phnv(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
} = {
  sseli(c0, ccphlo, cnv)
  eqsstri(ccphlo, cnv, (NrmCVec ⋂ { < < hs2, hs4 >, hs3 > | ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(hs2), ∀(hs1 ∈ ran(hs2),(((hs3 `(hs0[hs2]hs1))[^]2)[+]((hs3 `(hs0[hs2](-u(1)[hs4]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[×](((hs3 ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((hs3 ` hs1)[^]2)))))}))
  df-ph(hs2, hs4, hs3, hs0, hs1)
  inss1(cnv, { < < hs2, hs4 >, hs3 > | ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(hs2), ∀(hs1 ∈ ran(hs2),(((hs3 `(hs0[hs2]hs1))[^]2)[+]((hs3 `(hs0[hs2](-u(1)[hs4]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[×](((hs3 ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((hs3 ` hs1)[^]2)))))})
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs4.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: phrel
blocks.content: The class of all complex inner product spaces is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: phnvi
blocks.content: Every complex inner product space is a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isphg
blocks.content: The predicate "is a complex inner product space." An inner product space is a normed vector space whose norm satisfies the parallelogram law. The vector (group) addition operation is ` G ` , the scalar product is ` S ` , and the norm is ` N ` . An inner product space is also called a pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isphg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), cnv), wral(s0, c6, wral(s1, c6, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))))
  -| wceq(c6, crn(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), cnv), wral(s0, c6, wral(s1, c6, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), cnv), wral(s0, c6, wral(s1, c6, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))))), diffsc(s1, c6))

  elin2(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), ccphlo, cnv, coprab(hs0, hs2, hs1, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cneg(nat1), cv(hs2), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))))

  oveq1d(cfv(cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1))))
  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  oveq12d(co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  oveq1d(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c4, cv(s0))
  oveq1d(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c4))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c4, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c6, wral(s1, c6, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  diff.hs2.w(wral(s0, c6, wral(s1, c6, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, c6, wral(s1, c6, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(s0), c0, co(cneg(nat1), c2, cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: phop
blocks.content: A complex inner product space in terms of ordered pair components. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm phop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wceq(c0, cop(cop(c1, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(c0, cop(cop(c1, c2), c3), cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
  mpan(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(ccphlo))
  phrel()
  1st2nd(ccphlo, c0)
  syl5eqr(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cop(cop(c1, c2), c3), cop(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
  opeq2i(cfv(c1st, c0), c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  nmcvfval(c3, c0)
  opeq1d(cfv(c1st, c0), c3, cop(c1, c2), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cop(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
  phnv(c0)
  nvvc(c0, cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c1st, c0), cop(c1, c2), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc))
  mpan(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cvc), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)))), wrel(cvc))
  vcrel()
  1st2nd(cvc, cfv(c1st, c0))
  opeq12i(c1, c2, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)))
  vafval(c1, c0)
  smfval(c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm phop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD → c0 = < < c1, c2 >, c3 >)
  ⊣ c1 =(+v ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(normCV ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(c0, < < c1, c2 >, c3 >, <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
  mpan(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, Rel(CPreHilOLD))
  phrel()
  1st2nd(ccphlo, c0)
  syl5eqr(<(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, < < c1, c2 >, c3 >, <(1st ` c0), c3 >, c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
  opeq2i((1st ` c0), c3, (2nd ` c0))
  nmcvfval(c3, c0)
  opeq1d((1st ` c0), c3, < c1, c2 >, c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
  3syl(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (1st ` c0)= < c1, c2 >, c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD)
  phnv(c0)
  nvvc(c0, (1st ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  syl6eqr((1st ` c0), < c1, c2 >, <(1st `(1st ` c0)),(2nd `(1st ` c0))>, (1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD)
  mpan((1st ` c0)∈ CVecOLD, (1st ` c0)= <(1st `(1st ` c0)),(2nd `(1st ` c0))>, Rel(CVecOLD))
  vcrel()
  1st2nd(cvc, (1st ` c0))
  opeq12i(c1, c2, (1st `(1st ` c0)), (2nd `(1st ` c0)))
  vafval(c1, c0)
  smfval(c2, c0)
}
